fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The current American flag was designed by a high school student.

It started as a school project for Bob Heft’s junior-year history class, and it only earned a B- in 1958. His design had 50 stars even though Alaska and Hawaii weren’t states yet. Heft figured the two would earn statehood soon and showed the government his design. After President Dwight D. Eisenhower called to say his design was approved, Heft’s teacher changed his grade to an A.

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.value: “Tackle your hardest job first.  Usually when we are faced with a number of projects to work on, we take the easiest or the most rewarding one first.  Start with a job you really don’t want to do.  Once you get it out of the way, everything else will seem easy.”  -Red Auerbach

Waiter:  We serve everybody.  Have a seat.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some ways you show courtesy and respect to others?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions.  Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.”  -Mark Twain

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Since we have an extra day this year – Feb. 29th!  How about doing something special and unexpected for someone?   (Example: Leave someone a note or picture, send a thank you card to someone, give someone a book you think they would enjoy, invite someone to eat lunch with you.)  What is something you hope to do for someone today that is unexpected?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What traditions does your family have?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you don’t want anyone to find out, don’t do it.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the two fish get married?  Because they were hooked on each other.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Mistletoe has no scent.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you think about when you can’t sleep?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Worrying won’t stop bad stuff from happening, it just stops you from enjoying the good.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the lamb go swimming?  It needed a baa-th.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Canada’s postal code for the North Pole is HOH OHO.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your own worst family vacation memory?  What is your best family vacation memory?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle.”  -James Keller

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the bee say to the flower?  “Hello, honey!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The tallest known snowman was higher than a 12-story building.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Make your bucket list for the next 5 years, the next 10 years, and for life.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s a good day to have a good day!”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one eye say to the other eye?  “Just between you and me, something smells.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Almost 90% of snow is air.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine a future in which we each have a personalized robot servant.  What would yours be like?  What would it do?  What features would it have?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.”  -Robert Collier

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What does a chicken say when he goes into a library?  “Book-book-book- book-book!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The biggest gingerbread house was decorated with 4,750 pounds of icing – that’s heavier than a giraffe.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What things will people in the future say about how we live now?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A negative mind will never give you a positive life.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What grows between your nose and chin?  Tulips

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Belting out a tune will provide more energy than simply listening to an upbeat song. That’s according to the Journal of Music Therapy. So don’t just listen to “Shake It Off” – sing along……

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What’s your favorite song to sing along to?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “People inspire you, or they drain you – pick them wisely.”  -Hans F. Hanson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Who’s bigger – Mr. Bigger or Mr. Bigger’s baby?  Mr. Bigger’s baby, because it’s a little Bigger.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Christmas trees are grown in all 50 states including Hawaii.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think you watch too much TV?  How much TV do you think you watch each week?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.”  -Booker T. Washington

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do astronauts eat on?  Flying saucers.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: In 1997, in the US alone, the toy industry had annual sales of $22 billion.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your definition of bravery?  What’s the bravest thing you or someone you know has done?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.”  -Oprah

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of cake do policemen like?  Cop cakes.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Magnavox introduced the first videogame system in 1972 called Odyssey.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe something in your life that gives you joy.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.” – Paulo Coelho

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do planets go to school?  The univers-ity.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 1.76 billion candy canes are made during the Christmas season.  Early versions were straight, but in the late 1600’s they started to bend them to resemble a shepherd’s staff.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Have you ever taken special lessons of any kind – music, tennis, art, dance etc.?  If no, what kind of lessons would you like to take someday.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success is important, but defeats are valuable.”  -C.M. Jones

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value:
Teacher:  Are you having a hard time with the questions?
Student:  No, just the answers!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: South Africa’s giant bullfrog sometimes attacks lions.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some of the best special effects you’ve seen in a movie?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The tongue has no bones, but it is strong enough to break a heart.  So be careful with your words.  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What grows when it eats, but dies when it drinks?  Fire

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Only male turkeys gobble; females click.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite Thanksgiving meal?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Happiness depends upon ourselves.”  -Aristotle

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What would you get if you crossed a snowball with a werewolf?  Frost bite.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The largest pumpkin pie weighed 2,020 pounds.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are three things you are most thankful for?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.”  -Robert Brault

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How much sand would be in a hole one foot long, one foot wide, and one foot deep?  None, there is no sand in a hole!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: If grasshoppers were the size of people, they could leap the length of a basketball court.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What would you do if you thought you were being treated unfairly?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Whether you think you can or think you can’t – you are right.”  -Henry Ford

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the girl eat bullets?  So she could grow bangs.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The world’s lightest mammal – the bumblebee bat – weights about as much as two M&M’s.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe the “perfect best friend.”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A winner never whines.”  -Paul Brown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of bed is only good for three seasons?  One with no springs.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Applesauce was the first food eaten in space by an American astronaut.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What would you do with a billion dollars?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.”  -Muhammad Ali

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do fish sleep?  In waterbeds.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Messages from your brain travel along your nerves at up to 200 miles an hour.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How old would you like to live to be?  What are some of the things you hope to accomplish during your lifetime?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Learn from the mistakes of others – you can never live long enough to make them all yourself.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you stop a skunk from smelling?  Plug its nose.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Honey never spoils.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What kinds of things are boring to you?  What do you do to keep yourself from getting bored?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A mind stretched by a new idea never returns to its original dimension.”  -James Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the clock sad?  It had no one to tock to.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Hot dogs can last more than 20 years in landfills.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Some people have one or more superstitions.  (Some won’t walk under ladders, some have special clothes they wear on game days, some are afraid of black cats.)  Do you have any superstitions?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Enthusiasm is the greatest asset in the world.  It beats money, power, and influence.”  -Henry Chester

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did Dracula go to the doctor?  Because of his coffin.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Girls have more taste buds than boys do.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite joke?  Why do you think it’s funny?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Be positive with people and you’ll get positive results.”  -Ken Blanchard

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What animals can you never trust?  A lion and a cheetah (cheater).

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A bat can eat 3,000 insects in one night.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you think it would be like to grow up in the White House?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Focus on what you have instead of what you don’t have.  On what’s right in your world instead of what’s wrong.  On where you’re going instead of what you’ve been through.”  -Billy Cox

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why isn’t your nose 12 inches long?  Because then it would be a foot.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: An ant can carry 50 times its body weight.  (That’s like a kid carrying a car!)

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some ways you can give encouragement to others?  Why is that important?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “One of the great discoveries a man makes, one of his greatest surprises, is to find he can do what he was afraid he couldn’t do.”  -Henry Ford

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What starts with T, ends with T, and had T in it?  A teapot.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: People report the most UFO sightings when Venus is closest to Earth.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you believe in UFO’s?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Character is made by what you stand for; reputation, by what you fall for.”  -Robert Quillen

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of car has whiskers and purrs?  A Cat-illac.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: No one knows what color dinosaurs were.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Tell about a person whose accomplishments you admire.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The tougher the job, the greater the reward.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why shouldn’t you tell a pig a secret?  Because it squeals too much.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Vision uses one-third of all your brainpower.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think it’s important to vote?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success.”  -David Feherty

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the elephant take a suitcase on vacation?  Because he already had a trunk.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Opposite sides of dice always add up to 7.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think it’s important for people to travel into space?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success isn’t about how much money you make; it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.”  -Michelle Obama

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the baby banana say to the mother banana?  “I don’t peel good.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Chewing gum burns about 11 calories an hour.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are your grandparents like?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “To listen well is as powerful a means of influence as to talk well.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is the vampire unpopular?  Because he is a pain in the neck!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Owls can’t move their eyeballs.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your favorite game.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your life can’t go according to plan if you have no plan.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the teacher believe the ghost?  Because she could see right through him.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The year 2020 is the next time you can see a full moon on Halloween.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite costume or favorite thing to do on Halloween?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you don’t set goals for yourself, you are doomed to work to achieve the goals of someone else.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the best food to eat when you’re scared?  I scream.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Most spiders have 8 eyes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the scariest movie you have ever watched?  Do you enjoy watching scary movies or reading suspense books?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Do more than you have to do, more than your share, and do it as well as you can.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one potato say to the other potato?  “Keep your eyes peeled.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Scientists found that you can literally get cold feet when you’re nervous.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What if you found out that you only had a short time to live?  What are some things you would do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “There is a real magic in enthusiasm.  It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment.”  -Norman Vincent Peale

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the weatherman so happy?  Because snow news is good news.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 200 million Girl Scout cookies are sold every year – enough for each person in the U.S. to have half a box.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you think of live-action, on-the-scene television reporting?  Many people today believe that television cameras don’t just record the news, but also “make it happen.”  (Example: people acting out and doing things they wouldn’t do if the cameras weren’t around.)

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.”  -Ralph Waldo Emerson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s a firefly’s favorite part of school?  Glow and Tell.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More than half the world’s geysers are in Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think some jobs are for men and others are for women?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Most of us are satisfied with so little in ourselves but demand so much from others.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What would you get if you crossed a fish and a tuxedo?  A swim suit.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Some fish can grow almost a quarter of their body length in a single day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Think of a time when you were very mischievous.  What did you do and what happened as a result?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you can’t change your fate, change your attitude.”  -Amy Tan

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Which planet is the smoggiest?  Pollute-o

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The bird on the twitter logo is named Larry.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Does your family have any  special fall traditions?  What are some things you do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your rewards in life  are always in direct proportion to your contribution.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the elephants go on strike?  They were tired of working for peanuts.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Today’s cell phones are more powerful than the computers that sent astronauts to the moon.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you rather live without music or live without TV?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Being thankful is a habit – the best one you’ll ever have.”  -Life’s Greatest Lessons

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do bees sleep?  In a flowerbed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are more than 1,900 edible insect species on Earth.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How do you learn best?  By listening, by reading, or by doing?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When you lose, say little.  When you win, say less.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the pony eat cough drops?  It was a little hoarse.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The people who performed the voices of Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse were married in real life.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you rather have a big group of friends or one very close friend?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s not hard to make decisions when you know what your values are.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do trees have roots to hold them down?  Because they’re always trying to leaf.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Three out of four people admitted to sharing an ice-cream cone with their pet, a survey found.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite leisure-time activity?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Whatever you do, don’t do it halfway.”  -Bob Beamon

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did Mars and Earth collide on their trip around the sun?  They didn’t planet very well.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The original batmobile from the 1960s Batman TV show sold for $4.2 million.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are three things you’d like to achieve in your lifetime?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The man who believes he can do something is probably right, and so is the man who believes he can’t.”  -Andrew Jackson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does a cowboy cross the ocean?  On his seahorse.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Newborn babies don’t produce tears when they cry.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is something you’d like to learn to do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “No matter what the level of ability, you have more potential than you can ever develop in a lifetime.”  -James T. McCay

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do fish do for entertainment?  They play cod games.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A man floated for 235 miles in a chair tied to more than 150 helium balloons.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you like the most about school?  What do you like the least about school?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your attitude tells the world what you expect from life and whether you will achieve it or not.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the boy throw tuna against the wall?  He wanted to see the fishstick.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The sound of an iceberg breaking is louder than 214 oil tanker engines.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What would you like to do in your career?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We accomplish in proportion to what we attempt.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you scramble eggs?  g-e-s-g.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More than 30 million people in China live in caves.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How many of the 50 states have you been in?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Pride…character…work habits…lead to success.”  -Rick Comely

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: how do you clean a sheep?  Give it a baa-th.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A whale’s earwax can be as thick as a mattress.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What’s the best book you’ve ever read?  Why did you enjoy it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.”  -Martin Luther King

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do birds do for entertainment?  They tell yolks.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Some dogs are allergic to cats.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What two words best describe you as a student?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Confidence is a lot of this game or any game.  If you don’t think you can, you won’t.”  -Jerry West

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do spiders live in cornfields?  So they can build cob-webs.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: You’ll never see a full moon and the sun in the sky at the same time.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you rather be able to stop time or fly?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We should never let our fears hold us back from pursuing our hopes.”  -John F. Kennedy

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was it so hot in the stadium after the baseball game?  All the fans left.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Pandas eat as much as 36 pounds of bamboo every day – that’s as heavy as 144 hamburgers!

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What’s your favorite animated movie?  Why do you like that one?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “How we think shows through in how we act.  Attitudes are mirrors of the mind.  They reflect thinking.”  -David Joseph Schwartz

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the tree say to the lumberjack?  “Leaf me alone!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The juice of one type of chili pepper can burn through a latex glove.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Many people have emotional reactions to music.  Have you ever had this kind of experience?  Is there a particular song that brings back memories of a specific time?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Pride is a personal commitment.  It is an attitude that separates excellence from mediocrity.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the mommy rope say to the baby rope?  “Don’t be knotty.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 1.9 billion years ago, much of the Earth smelled like rotten eggs.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Who is someone you consider to be a hero?  What makes you think so highly of this person?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Our life is what our thoughts make it.”  -Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the Incredible Hulk so good at gardening?  He had a green thumb.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A grizzly bear can sniff out food 18 miles away.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe a time when you lost your temper.  What happened?  What were the results?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Challenges can be stepping stones or stumbling blocks.  It’s just a matter of how you view them.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of candy is never on time?  Choco-late.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A turtle’s shell is made up of about 50 bones.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that you have a son or daughter who is about to become President of the United States.  What advice would you offer him or her?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “He who is good for making excuses is seldom good for anything else.”  -Benjamin Franklin

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do cowboys like on their salad?  Ranch dressing.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: NASCAR drivers can travel the length of a football field in just over a second.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you have a phobia?  If you do, how does this phobia affect your life?  If you don’t have a phobia, do you know someone that does?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A man may make mistakes, but he isn’t a failure until he starts blaming someone else.”  -John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the duck so grouchy?  It was always in a fowl mood.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Some early baseballs were made of fish eyes covered in leather.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What’s the most creative class assignment a teacher ever gave you?  Did you enjoy it?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Winners never quit and quitters never win.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s the best day for sailing?  Winds-day.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Nosewise, Sturdy, and Hardy were popular names for dogs in medieval times.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are your favorite kind of books to read?  Mystery, fiction, adventure, romance, short stories etc.?  Why do you enjoy these kinds of books?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The difference between good and great is a little extra effort.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do ants like to eat?  At a restaur-ant.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: You lose about a million skin cells every 24 hours.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: When you can have pizza any way you want it, what do you put on it?  What do you eat with it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.”  -Jim Rohn

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the best way to communicate with a fish?  Drop it a line!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Rabbits can see behind them without moving their heads.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were given the opportunity to go to the moon, would you want to go?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Two things prevent us from happiness; living in the past and observing others.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do biologists talk to each other?  With their cell phones.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Buttered toast almost always falls butter-side down.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you think someone could use a friend, be one.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do elves learn in kindergarten?  The elf-abet.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The Mississippi River sometimes flows backward during powerful hurricanes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You have brains in your head.  You have feet in your shoes.  You can steer yourself any direction you choose.”  -Dr. Seuss

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one wall say to the other?  Let’s meet at the corner!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: When you’re driving on the highway, the car engine is hot enough to cook a piece of chicken.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Have you ever done something that was out of your comfort zone?  How did you feel after you did it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You can’t use up creativity.  The more you use the more you have.”  -Maya Angelou

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the queen go to the dentist?  To get crowns on her teeth.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: You can find more than 1,000 ancient dinosaur and reptile footprints along the “Dinosaur Freeway” – stretching from Colorado to New Mexico.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Are your thoughts positive or negative?  How does this influence your life?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “True joy comes when you inspire, encourage, and guide someone else on a path that benefits him or her.”  -Zig Ziglar

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you get if a cow is in an earthquake?  A milkshake.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Canada produced enough maple syrup in one year to fill 13 Olympic-size pools.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do an inventory of your habits.  Are they positively affecting your life?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Most people do not listen with the intent to understand.  They listen with the intent to reply.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the birds get in trouble?  They were using fowl language.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Full moons appear brighter in the winter than in summer.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Who looks up to you?  Are you being a good influence and inspiration by helping others?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.”  -Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What does a computer do when it’s tired?  It crashes.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The first President to be born in a hospital was President Carter.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were President, what is the first thing you would do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.”  -Dr. Seuss

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value:
Knock, knock.
Who’s there?
Peas.
Peas who?
Won’t you peas be my Valentine.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 189 million roses are sold on Valentines Day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Tell someone what you love about them.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The only way to have a true friend is to be a true friend.”  -Ralph Waldo Emerson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a monster with a high IQ?  Frank-Einstein

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: An octopus can detach an arm on purpose and then regrow it.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you consider yourself to be thoughtful of others’ opinions?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Be kind.  Remember everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do cats like to put in their milk?  Mice cubes.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you consider yourself to be spoiled?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Enthusiasm is like a coat of fresh paint.  It covers up a lot of rough spots.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Giving up is the ultimate tragedy.”  -Robert J. Donovan

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I cannot give you a formula for success, but I can give you the formula for failure, which is:  Try to please everybody.”  -Herbert Bayard Swope

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: When do you ask hamburgers lots of questions?  When you want to grill them.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Squirrels sweat through their feet.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Who are three people that have influenced your life the most?  How have they influenced you?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A good friend never gets in your way unless you’re on your way down.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How are fish and music the same?  They both have scales.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Yuma, Arizona, is the sunniest place in the United States.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you fear failure?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Motivation is what gets you started.  Habit is what keeps you going.”  -Jim Ryun

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why are fish so bad at basketball?  They don’t like getting close to the net.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?”  -George Eliot

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a deer with no eyes?  No eye deer (no idea).

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What was your favorite Super Bowl commercial?  Do you think it’s worth the money to have a Super Bowl ad?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Concentrate on finding your goal, then concentrate on reaching it.”  -Col. M. Friedsam

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your brain remembers 10,000 scents.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe a time when you lost your temper.  What happened?  What were the results of losing your temper?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Children learn more from what you are than what you teach.”  -W. E. B. DuBois

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What happens when race car drivers eat too much?  They get Indy-gestion.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average adult tells about 11 lies in a week.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Nothing is opened by mistake as often as one’s mouth.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.value: “The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Dogs have three times more taste buds than cats.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: One restaurant chain is going to start using tablets to allow customers to bypass servers on some orders and order directly from the tablet.  Do you think this is a good idea?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Be sure to taste your words before you spit them out.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.value: “Why worry?  If you’ve done the very best you can, worrying won’t make it any better.”  -Walt Disney

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What you believe yourself to be, you are.”  -Claude M. Bristol

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your attitude tells the world what you expect from life and whether you will achieve it or not.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Talent will get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.”  -John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Choose five symbols or objects that represent you.  Why did you choose these things?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The best kind of pride is that which compels a man to do his very best work, even if no one is watching.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the elf crying?  He stubbed his mistle-toe.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.value: “You must dedicate yourself to a far-reaching goal and sacrifice to reach it.  You must enjoy what you do.  Reach beyond your abilities; recognize that no talent, without hard work, can make you a winner.”  -George Allen

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: In the future, how do you think people will travel on land?  In the water?  In space?

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There’s more salt in one gallon of sea water than in 49 pounds of potato chips!

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that anthropologists studied your surroundings for a week.  What do you think they would find interesting?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Each day we are given a valuable gift, a ‘new day.’  What will we do with that gift?  The choice is ours to make good use of it or squander it.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Always do your best.  What you plant now, you will harvest later.”  -Og Mandino

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite animated movie?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the invisible man turn down a job offer?  He just couldn’t see himself doing it.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe the “perfect best friend.”  What is the person like in terms of personality and interests.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you would rather have talked.”  -Mark Twain

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Americans eat roughly 535 million pounds of turkey on Thanksgiving.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite Thanksgiving meal?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.”  -Helen Keller

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What three things are you thankful for.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Work hard in silence let success make the noise.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of bugs read the dictionary?  Spelling bees.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Canned tuna is one of the most popular pizza toppings in Germany.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had the opportunity to be silly and goof off for a whole day, what would you do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your life is a result of the choices you make… If you don’t like your life it is time to start making better choices.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of candy is never on time?  Choco-late.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Is it important to study the stars?  Why or why not?  What’s your favorite part of the night sky?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The trick is to enjoy life.  Don’t wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.”  -Marjorie Pay Hinckley

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why wouldn’t the teddy bear eat anything?  He was already stuffed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 400 million tweets are sent every day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What worries you most about the environment – air pollution, the destruction of the rain forest, oil spills or something else?  Is there anything you can do personally to help the environment?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The best portion of your life will be the small, nameless moments you spend smiling with someone who matters to you.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the string ever win a race?  It was always tied.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A meteor crater in South Africa is wider than Ireland.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Many people have emotional reactions to music.  Have you ever had this kind of experience?  Is there a particular piece of music that makes you feel a certain way?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Do the very best you can with what you have.”  -Theodore Roosevelt

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If  you think you can, you can.  And if you think you can’t, you’re right.”  -Mary Kay Ash

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Thought of the Day
