fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Can you think of someone who isn’t famous who has inspired you?  Explain how this person has inspired you?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Honesty is the first chapter of the book of wisdom.”  -Thomas Jefferson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the best way to communicate with a fish?  Drop it a line!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The Statue of Liberty’s torch sways up to 5 inches in the wind.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could change one thing about weather in your part of the country, what would it be?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Don’t tell other people your troubles.  Half of them aren’t interested, and the other half are glad you got what you had coming to you.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call an oyster who doesn’t let anyone share his pearl?  Shell-fish

fields.name: Random Fact 0f the Day
fields.value: The oldest vehicle in human history is a floating log.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Predict something.  Anything.  Tell what you think will happen, where you think it will happen, and who will be involved.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Don’t let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.”  -Richard L. Evans

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Did you hear about the actor who fell through the floor?  It was just a stage he was going through.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: About 21,000 commercial airline flights are scheduled daily in the U.S. with only about 5,000 planes available.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Hans Christian Andersen was born on this day in 1805.  He was the Danish writer of the fairy tales, “The Ugly Duckling,” The Red Shoes,” and his story called “The Little Mermaid” was even made into a movie.  What is your favorite children’s fairy tale?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The most effective way to ensure the value of the future is to confront the present courageously and constructively.”  -Rollo May

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the skeleton go to the ball?  He had no body to dance with.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Men who kiss their wives in the morning live five years longer than those who don’t.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think April Fool’s pranks and jokes are funny?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.”  -Ralph Waldo Emerson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did Jimmy throw the clock out the window?  He wanted to see time fly.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: In 1950, rain forests covered about 14% of the earth’s land surface.  By 2001, this had diminished to 6%.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Who is your favorite funny person?  Give the reasons for your choice.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The most important thing in communication is to hear what isn’t being said.”  -Peter F. Drucker

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the mommy rope say to the baby rope?  “Don’t be knotty.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The oldest person to ever be issued a driver’s license in the U.S. was 109.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite thing about Spring?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Character is much easier kept than recovered.”  -Thomas Paine

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you get when you cross a dog and a daisy?  A collie-flower.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Right-handers live an average of 9 years longer than left-handers.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What does being healthy mean to you?  What do you do to stay healthy?  Do you exercise regularly?  Eat healthy foods?  Do something for others?  What could you do differently that would make you healthier?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Hard work beats talent, unless talent works.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of fish can perform surgery?  Sturgeons

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A caterpillar has over 2,000 muscles.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think you watch too much TV?  How much TV do you think you watch each week?  What are some other things you could be doing instead of watching TV?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Winning isn’t everything, but making the effort to win is.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a monkey who won’t behave?  A bad-boon.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A hurricane releases more energy in 10 minutes than all the world’s nuclear weapons combined.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Many zoos are no longer putting animals in cages.  They’re displaying them in roomier, more natural settings.  How do you feel about this?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you never take a chance you will never be defeated – but you will never accomplish anything either.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the dog depressed?  Because his life was so ruff.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Children grow faster during spring.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: It seems that every day brings a new invention or innovation – a new idea, device, or way of doing something.  Describe an invention or innovation that you feel will be particularly important or helpful in the years to come.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You must dedicate yourself to a far-reaching goal and sacrifice to reach it.  You must enjoy what you do.  Reach beyond your abilities; recognize that no talent without hard work, can make you a winner.”  -George Allen

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why couldn’t the polar bear get along with the penguin?  They were polar opposites.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A paper cannot be folded more than 9 times.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did you ever wish for something and regret it later?  What was it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your day will only be as good as your attitude.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What would you get if a pig learned karate?  Pork chops.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average computer user blinks 7 times a minute.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Some young people go to school far away from their homes and families.  Would you like to go to school in a different part of the country or the world?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the ocean say to the shore?  Nothing, it just waved!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Adults have, on average, 2 gallons of air in the space between their skin and their clothes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think a person is weak if he or she chooses to walk away from a disagreement with someone?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I never did anything worth doing by accident, nor did any of my inventions come by accident.  They came by work.”  -Thomas Alva Edison

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you say before you start a meeting with ghosts?  “Please be sheeted.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A single coffee tree yields only one pound of roasted, ground coffee annually.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you suddenly became a TV executive, name two television programs you would cancel.  Explain your reasons for canceling these shows.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When you are making a success of something, it’s not work.  It’s a way of life.  You enjoy yourself because you are making your contribution to the world.”  -Andy Granatelli

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why wouldn’t the band leader go outside in the thunderstorm?  Because he was a good conductor.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: An elephant is the same length as the tongue of a blue whale.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you believe states that have the death penalty make criminals think twice before committing crimes?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When every physical and mental resource is focused, one’s power to solve a problem multiplies tremendously.”  -Norman Vincent Peale

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What does a witch ask for when she checks into a hotel?  Broom service.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Prince Charles and Prince William never travel on the same airplane just in case there is a crash.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think our environment would be in such danger today if more people had started thinking about conservation and recycling 50 years ago?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We are more interested in making others believe we are happy than in trying to be happy ourselves.”  -Francois De La Rochefoucauld

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the clock sad?  It had no one to tock to.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are certain areas of the United States that are exempt from daylight savings time.  They are Arizona, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands, and the American Samoa.  Parts of Indiana are exempt as well.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Can you remember the happiest day you ever had in school?  Describe it.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Failure isn’t fatal and success isn’t final.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of bed is only good for three seasons?  One with no springs.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your body is creating and killing 15 million red blood cells per second!

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Is there anything you can’t do that you wish you could (spell better, swim etc.)?  How does it make you feel when you can’t do this thing?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “In the confrontation between the stream and the rock, the stream always wins – not through strength, but by perseverance.”  – Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the lady throw her butter out the window?  She wanted to see a butterfly.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Peanuts grow underground.  They grow there for four or five months before they’re ready to be harvested.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could open a door and walk into any historical event, which one would you choose?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What you’re thinking, what shape your mind is in, is what makes the biggest difference of all.”  -Willie Mays

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did Thomas Edison invent the lightbulb?  He got a bright idea.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The most useful chemical in the world is salt (sodium chloride).  It has more than 14,000 different uses.  It is used in larger quantities and in many more ways than any other known chemical.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could invent a robot to do the same three tasks each day for you so that you could have more time to do other things you enjoy, what would these tasks be?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The golden opportunity you are seeking is in yourself.  It is not in your environment, not in luck or chance, or the help of others; it is in yourself alone.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the baseball player a bad sport?  He stole third base and then went home.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Nine out of 10 people are right-handed.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: When you go to a carnival or an amusement park, which rides do you like to ride?  Why?  Which rides don’t you like to ride?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Following the path of least resistance is what makes rivers and men crooked.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you get when you cross an elephant with a fish?  Swimming trunks.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Hair and fingernails are made of the same substance – keratin.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some things your family does together for fun or entertainment?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Before everything else, getting ready is the secret to success.”  -Henry Ford

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the horse put on the blanket?  He was a little colt.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 70% of the women in the Senate were once girl scouts.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are three of your greatest skills or strengths?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Love and kindness are never wasted.  They always make a difference.”  -Barbara DeAngelis

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the girl trust the ocean?  There was something fishy about it.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Pain travels at a speed of 350 feet per second.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How important is having a job that pays a lot of money?  What are some worthwhile jobs that don’t pay a lot of money?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.”  -Sally Koch

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What animals can you never trust?  A lion and a cheetah.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Humpback whales create the loudest sound of any living creature.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Why is it important to share your thoughts and ideas?  Why is this sometimes difficult to do?  Is there anything you can do to make it easier for a classmate to share his/her ideas with the class?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Do not fear to step into the unknown.  For where there is risk, there is also reward.”  -Lori Hard

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do bears go on vacation?  Bear-muda

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Owls are the only bird species able to differentiate numbers and colors.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What does being “dependable” mean to you?  Why do you think dependability is important?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The most basic and powerful way to connect to another person is to listen.  Just listen.  Perhaps the most important thing we ever give each other is our attention…a loving silence often has more power to heal and to connect than the most well-intentioned words.”  -Rachel Naomi Remen

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do fish put their money?  The river bank.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Birds do not sleep in their nests.  They may occasionally nap in them, but they actually sleep in other places.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: The average 5 year-old laughs 500 times a day, the average adult 18 times a day, why?  How does having a sense of humor affect the way you see things?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.”  -Michael Jordan

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Did you hear about the red ship and the blue ship that collided?  All the sailors were marooned.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Christopher Columbus’s fee for “discovering” America was about $300.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What does it take to be a good communicator?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Making no decision is still making a decision.”  -Thomas Jefferson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a cow that’s afraid of everything?  A cow-ard.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average car in Japan is driven 4,400 miles per year.  In the U.S. it’s 9,500 miles per year.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How do you define “success?”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A sound body is good; a sound mind is better; but a strong and clean character is better than either.”  -Theodore Roosevelt

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is a bride sad on her wedding day?  She doesn’t get to marry the best man.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: On average, a human must move their eye muscles 10,000 – 15,000 times a day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Plans don’t always go exactly as people expect them to.  Have you ever had something turn out in a way that surprised you?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You must do the thing you think you cannot do.”  -Eleanor Roosevelt

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why does the letter A look like a flower?  Because a B always comes after it.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: According to one study, 24% of homes with lawns have some sort of lawn ornament.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your earliest memory?  Describe it.  Why do you think you remember it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success is not a sometimes thing.  In other words, you don’t do what is right once in awhile, but all the time.  Success is a habit.  Winning is a habit.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: When is a car not a car?  When it turns into a driveway.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More calories are burned while sleeping than sitting and watching tv.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think court hearings should be broadcast on television?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The only way to have a friend is to be one.”  -Ralph Waldo Emerson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do planets go to school?   The univers-ity.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: For most people, no matter how hard you pinch the skin on your elbow with your fingers it doesn’t hurt.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were an author, what kind of book would you write?  Would it be a mystery, a how-t0 book, a horror story, a romance, a science-fiction adventure?  Why would you write this kind of book?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Similarities create friendship’s while differences hold them together.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do astronauts eat on?  Flying saucers.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Bulletproof vests, fire escapes, windshield wipers and laser printers were all invented by women.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Make a list of some of the things you usually carry with you in your pockets or book bag.  Why do you have these things?  What do you think these things say about you?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.”  -Benjamin Disraeli

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does a snake get to work in the morning?  In hisss car.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The creator of the NIKE Swoosh symbol was paid only $35 for the design.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Have you ever flown in an airplane?  If yes, tell what it was like.  If no, tell what you think it might be like to fly.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Love and happiness remind me of sticky peanut butter.  When you spread them around, you can’t help but end up getting some on yourself!”  -Marcia Jordan

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the boy bird say to the girl bird on Valentines Day?  Let me call you tweet heart!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More than 36 million heart-shaped boxes of chocolate will be sold for Valentines Day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: “To have a heart of gold” means to care about other people.  Describe someone that you know that has a heart of gold.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “No battle of any importance can be won without enthusiasm.”  -John Lord O’Brian

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of bird can lift up anything?  A crane.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average cost of a movie ticket in 1940 was 24 cents.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could offer three suggestions to someone about how to live a happy life, what three things would you suggest?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “No man fails who does his best.”  -Orison Swett Marden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the pony say when it had a sore throat?  “Excuse me, but I’m a little hoarse.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average computer worker types 90,000 keystrokes in an 8-hour work shift.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could suddenly give yourself a talent that you don’t presently have, what would it be?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When your work speaks for itself, do not interrupt.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What was the math teacher’s favorite dessert?  Pi.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The two steps at the top and the two at the bottom are the four most dangerous steps in a stair case.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you like the “busyness” of a big city, or do you prefer the peace and quiet of the country?  Explain your answer.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “One thing common to most success stories is the alarm clock.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the noisiest game you can play?  Racket-ball.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The human brain has the capacity to store everything that you experience.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What kinds of things are boring to you?  What do you do to keep yourself from getting bored?  If someone came up to you right now and said, “I’m bored,” what suggestions would you have for him or her?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Are you trying to make something for yourself or something of yourself?”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What does a snowman eat for breakfast?  Frosted Flakes.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: In the United States, a pound of potato chips cost two hundred times more than a pound of potatoes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Why is it important to keep old things?  Does your family have anything that’s old?  What is it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s not whether you get knocked down.  It’s whether you get up again.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What language does a billboard speak?  Sign language.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 62 degrees Fahrenheit is the minimum temperature required for a grasshopper to be able to hop.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think it matters when a species becomes extinct?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You can stand by and watch the world go by – and it will.”  – Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What happens when race car drivers eat too much?  They get Indy-gestion.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes the interaction of 72 different muscles to produce human speech.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some of the clothing styles you see people wearing today?  What do you think of today’s fashion trends?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Character is like a tree and reputation like its shadow.  The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.”  -Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one earthquake say to the other earthquake?  “It’s not my fault.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Ingrown toenails are hereditary.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could be a character in any book in the world, what character would you choose to be?  Would you change anything about this character if you could?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Before you flare up at anyone’s faults, take time to count ten, ten of your own.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do fish sleep?  In waterbeds.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The state with the longest coastline in the U.S. is Alaska.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you remember when you first learned to read?  How did it make you feel?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you aren’t fired with enthusiasm, you will be fired with enthusiasm.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the lamb go swimming?  It needed a baaa-th.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The most popular sport as a topic for a film is boxing.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Many people have talked about adding another face to the four already on Mount Rushmore.  If it was up to you to make the decision, whose face would you add and why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you’re prepared, then you’re able to feel confident.”  -Robert J. Ringer

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Who’s bigger – Mr. Bigger or Mr. Bigger’s baby?  Mr. Bigger’s baby, because it’s a little Bigger.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average person over fifty will have spent 5 years waiting in lines.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Einstein once said, “Imagination is more important than knowledge.”  What do you think he meant?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Creative minds are like parachutes…they work only when they are open.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value:
Tie a knot in my neck and I’ll be much more fun.  What am I?
A balloon.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Males sweat 40% more than females.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think it’s important for people to travel into space?  Why or why not?  Have you ever thought about being part of the space program?  If so, what would you like to do?  If not, why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “All my life I wanted to be somebody.  Now I see that I should have been more specific.”  -Jane Wagner

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is a duck’s favorite snack?  Cheese and quackers.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: This year, Harvard University will deny admission to an estimated 1,600 High School valedictorians.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What kind of weather would best describe your personality (a hurricane, snow, sunshine, fog)?  Choose a kind of weather (or more than one , if necessary) that best expresses your personality.  Explain the reasons for your choices.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile acheivement.”  -Henry Ford

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do cowboys like on their salad?  Ranch dressing.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The most used expression of any language is “OK.”

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think a woman or man who stays at home works as hard as one who works outside the home?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Despair doubles our strength.”  -John Ray

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the pony get sent to his room without supper?  He wouldn’t stop horsing around.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Only female mosquitoes bite.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Name two jobs that you think have a high stress level.  Would you consider working at either of these jobs?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Great moments are born from great opportunities.”  -Herb Brooks

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is the snail one of the strongest creatures in the world?  They can carry their houses on their backs.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 12 newborns will be given to the wrong parents daily.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think teaching is a difficult profession?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.”  -Thomas Jefferson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is spaghetti the smartest food there is?  It always uses its noodle.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The Statue of Liberty’s fingernails weigh about 100 pounds apiece.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: We get angry at ourselves for lots of reasons.  When was the last time you were angry with yourself?  What was the reason?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Whenever you fall, pick up something.”  -Oswald Theodore Avery

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the broom late for school?  It over-swept.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Blueberry juice boosts memory.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were asked to design a menu for the cafeteria for one week, what would it consist of?  (Be sure to include different foods for each day of the week.)

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We do not need, and indeed never will have, all the answers before we act…It is often only through taking action that we can discover some of them.”  -Charlotte Bunch

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the lettuce win the race?  He was a head.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More money is spent on gardening than any other hobby.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: The purpose of commercials on television or radio, or ads in magazines is to sell products to people.  Can you think of an ad that makes a product seem better than it is?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Contentment consists not in great wealth, but in few wants.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did the karate teacher greet his students?  “Hi-Yah!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: According to studies, men change their minds two or three times more often than women.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Can you think of five things you can do to become a better student?  What are they?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You prove your worth with your actions, not with your mouth.”  -Pat Riley

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was it so hot in the stadium after the baseball game?  All the fans left.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The most productive day of the workweek is Tuesday.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Have you ever been afraid to speak out in class?  If so, explain why you felt this way.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I’ve always felt it was not up to anyone else to make me give my best.”  -Hakeem Olajuwon

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why don’t Dalmations like to take baths?  They don’t like to be spotless.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: People do not get sick from cold weather; it’s from being indoors a lot more.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did being in school ever help you discover a talent or ability you didn’t know you had?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We can do only what we think we can do.  We can be only what we think we can be.  We can have only what we think we can have.  What we do, what we are, what we have, all depend upon what we think.”  -Robert Collier

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the elevator say to its friend?  “I think I’m coming down with something.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A starfish has 8 eyes, one on each leg.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you remember anything about your first day of school?  Were you scared?  What do you remember most about it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.  It will make or break a company…a home…a team.  The remarkable thing is we have a choice every day regarding the ATTITUDE we will embrace for that day.  We cannot change our past, we cannot change the inevitable, but we can change our ATTITUDE.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the nose feeling sad?  It was tired of getting picked on.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The state with the highest proportion of people walking to work is Alaska.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think cars will be used 100 years from now?  If so, what features will they have?  If not, describe your “vehicle” of the future.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Adversity is the state in which a man most easily becomes acquainted with himself…”  -Samuel Johnson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What fruit teases people a lot?  A bana na na na na na!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Only 30% of people can expand and contract their nostrils at will.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you think your neighborhood (or town) will look like in 20 years?  Will it be changed?  If you live on a farm, do you think it will stay the same?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The best kind of pride is that which compels a man to do his very best work, even if no one is watching.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the peanut butter say to the bread?  “Quit loafing around.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Pearls dissolve in vinegar.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What was the first thing you wanted to be when you grew up?  Have you changed your mind many times since then?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Those who profit most are those who give the most.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why can’t the bank keep a secret?  It has too many tellers.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Everyone drinks coffee to perk themselves up, but in fact, an apple can perk one up more than a cup of coffee can.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did you make any odd food concotions when you were small?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I learned that good judgment comes from experience and that experience grows out of mistakes.”  -Omar N. Bradley

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the best food to eat when you’re scared?  I scream.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The first object with a number scanning label was a pack of chewing gum.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are your views on UFOs?  Do you think there’s “something out there”?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Pleasure is very seldom found where it is sought; our brightest blazes of gladness are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.”  -Samuel Johnson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does a gingerbread man make his bed?  With a cookie sheet.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A dragonfly has a life span of 24 hours.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Which would you rather have, a three-day weekend or a day off in the middle of the week?  Give your reasons.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Realize what you really want.  It stops you from chasing butterflies and puts you to work digging gold.”  -William Moulton Marston

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is worse than finding a worm in your apple?  Finding half of a worm in your apple!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are 293 ways to make change for a dollar.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some special things you did over the holiday break? Are you glad to be back in school?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If we are strong, our character will speak for itself.  If we are weak, words will be of no help.”  -John F. Kennedy

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do cows like to eat?  Smooooooothies.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Peanuts are one of the  ingredients of dynamite.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is one thing you hope to accomplish this year?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I do the best I know how, the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing it to the end.”  -Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What runs around the football field but never moves?  A fence.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The largest known snowflake was wider than a frisbee.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: As you near the end of the year, write about something important you’ve learned over the past 12 months.  How have you grown and changed?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Enthusiasm moves the world.”  -Arthur James Balfour

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is a race car driver’s favorite meal?  Fast food.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A man skipped a rock on water 51 times in one throw.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How old would you like to live to be?  What are some of the things you hope to accomplish during your lifetime?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Some people dream of worthy accomplishments, while others stay awake and do them.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: When does your dinner never get hot?  When it’s chili.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are about three pounds of bacteria living in your stomach.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe something in your life that gives you joy.  This can be another person, a thing, an achievement – anything you choose.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The only things that are going to change you from where you are today to where you are going to be five years from now are the people you meet and the books you read.”  -Lou Holtz

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call bears with no ears?  B.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There is almost always an even number of rows on an ear of corn.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your favorite game to play.  Why is this game your favorite?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Set a goal – then get rid of those things in your life which keep you from attaining that goal.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do ants like to eat?  At a restaur-ant.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes a wet dog less than a second to shake off half of the water on its fur.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What else besides money is important to consider when choosing a career?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Before you can score, you must have a goal.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why are fish so bad at basketball?  They don’t like getting close to the net.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Most frogs eat their skin after they shed it.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did anyone ever make a present for you instead of buying one?  What was it?  Did receiving this home-made gift make you feel differently than if the gift had been purchased from a store?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The difference between good and great is a little extra effort.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the cat get detention at school?  Because he was a cheetah.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes 540 peanuts to make one 12-ounce jar of peanut butter.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did you ever get the giggles when you didn’t want them?  Describe what happened.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Win without boasting, lose without excuse.”  -Albert Payson Terhune

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Who keeps the ocean clean?  The mermaid.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A car could drive around earth 87 times on the amount of fuel it takes to fill a jumbo jet’s tank.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What’s the most interesting gift you’ve ever received?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A man is not hurt so much by what happens, as by his opinion of what happens.”  -Michel Eyquem Montaigne

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do elves learn in kindergarten?  The elf-abet.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are over a billion motor vehicles on the planet.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Is a lie always bad?  Can you give an example of a lie that isn’t bad?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When you blame others, you give up your power to change.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is Santa’s favorite snack?  Peanut butter and jolly.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: One man dribbled a basketball for 230 miles to raise money for Japanese tsunami victims.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe a time when you gave someone good advice.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s what you know after you know it all that counts.”  -Harry S. Truman

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why isn’t your nose 12 inches long?  Because then it would be a foot.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A mouse can squeeze through a hole the size of a piece of popcorn.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did you ever have to wear something you hated?  Describe it.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “People are human.  If you’re going to criticize them, compliment them first.”  -Bum Phillips

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do vampires brush their fangs?  Because they don’t like bat breath.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: People in the United States eat more bananas than apples and oranges combined.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your dream room.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What we must decide is perhaps how we are valuable rather than how valuable we are.”  -Edgar Z. Friedenberg

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What has fingers but cannot use them?  Gloves.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: An elephant’s tooth can weigh as much as a bowling ball.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite Christmas song?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It is not the weight of the load that gets you down, it’s the way you carry it.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is something everyone has seen but will never see again?  Yesterday.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: If you could drive to the sun, it would take about 190 years to get there.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Write about a difficult decision you had to make.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions.  Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.”  -Mark Twain

fields.name: Joke of the Day
Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your right lung is a little bigger than your left lung.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: In the future, you may be able to take a space elevator thousands of miles above Earth.  Would you like to do that?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Failure is good.  It’s fertilizer.  Everything I’ve learned about coaching I’ve learned by making mistakes.”  -Rick Pitino

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: “What hand do you butter your toast with?”  “Neither, I use a knife!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It’s possible for a seed to blow across the ocean and sprout on another continent.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Write something to yourself to be sealed now and opened and read by you in ten years.  What would you like to have yourself remember?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached as by the obstacles that one has overcome while trying to succeed.”  -Mark Twain

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What grows between your nose and chin?  Tulips.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: You are rarely more than six feet away from a spider.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe a time you performed in front of an audience?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Only if you have been in the deepest valley can you ever know how magnificent it is to be on the highest mountain.”  -Richard N ixon

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the baby banana say to the mother banana?  “I don’t peel good.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes about 460 gallons of water to make one hamburger.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Finish this thought:  “If I could change one thing about myself…”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Never worry about what you are escaping from.  Reserve your anxieties for what you are escaping to.”  -Michael Chabon

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What grows when it eats, but dies when it drinks?  Fire

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: You can beat brain freeze by pressing your tongue to the roof of your mouth.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Did you ever stick up for someone?  What did you do?  How did you feel?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The shortest distance between two people is a smile.”  -Victor Borge

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the dog talk to his foot?   It’s not polite to talk back to your paw.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The world’s most stolen food is cheese.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What was the best thing about Thanksgiving break?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.”  -Jonathan Safran Foer

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is a ghost’s favorite car?  Boo-icks

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: When glass breaks, the cracks move faster than 3,000 miles an hour.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the best part of Thanksgiving break?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from  you.”  -B.B. King

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: A lady was picking through the frozen turkeys at the grocery store, but couldn’t find one big enough for her family.  She asked a stock boy, “Do these turkeys get any bigger?”  The stock boy replied, “No ma’am, they’re dead.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average age of a passenger on the Mayflower was 32.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What five things are you thankful for?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies.  The man who never reads lives only one.”  -George RR Martin

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What can a fisherman catch when it’s raining?  A cold.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Some makeup has fish scales in it.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could meet any real person on earth, who would it be?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Time has a wonderful way of showing us what really matters.”  -Margaret Peters

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you stop a skunk from smelling?  Plug its nose.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average length of employment for a retail worker is 90 days.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Finish this sentence.  Music is…

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We cannot start over, but we can begin now, and make a new ending.”  -Zig Ziglar

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of cake do policemen like?  Cop cakes.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Book bags shouldn’t exceed 10% to 20% of a child’s body weight.  More than half of students ages 12 to 17 carry backpacks that are too heavy.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Are you a milk drinker?  Why is it important?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The greatest gift you can give to someone is to believe in them.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does a cat keep his breath fresh?  Mousewash.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 89% of U.S. pet owners buy a holiday gift for their animal.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you enjoy going to a movie theater or renting a movie and watching it at home?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “A river cuts through a rock, not because of its power but its persistence.”  -Jim Watkins

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why shouldn’t you tell a pig a secret?  Because it squeals too much.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A $2 bottle of water costs only about 5 cents to produce.  That’s a 4,000% markup.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What food are you looking forward to eating at Thanksgiving?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What comes easy won’t last.  What lasts won’t come easy.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why can’t leopards play hide and seek?  They’re always spotted.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your stomach would digest itself without mucus.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think there is life on other planets?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “There are no perfect relationships.  It’s how you accept the imperfections that make it perfect.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did the farmer count his cows?  With a cow-culator.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More men are color-blind than women.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the bravest thing you’ve ever done?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Never let the things you WANT make you forget the things you HAVE.”  -Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the two fish get married?  Because they were hooked on each other.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The temperature on the moon can be hotter than boiling water.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What kind of job would you like to have when you grow up?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The trouble with not having a goal is that you can spend your life running up and down the field and never score.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the tie say to the hat?  “You go on ahead, and I’ll hang around.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A shark can grow and lose up to 30,000 teeth in its lifetime.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you consider yourself lucky?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.”  -Samuel Johnson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What starts with T, ends with T, and had T in it?  A teapot.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The White House has 132 rooms, 35 bathrooms, and 6 levels in the Residence area.  There are also 412 doors, 147 windows, 28 fireplaces, 8 staircases, and 3 elevators.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you like to be President or in politics someday?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success is not a sometimes thing.  In other words, you don’t do what is right once in awhile, but all the time.  Success is a habit.  Winning is a habit.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the bee say to the flower?  Hello, honey!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The tallest U.S. President was Abraham Lincoln at 6’4.”  The shortest U.S. President was James Madison at 5’4.”

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you think makes a good President?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Steps to success:  practice, work, sweat, achieve, shower, repeat.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do fish sleep?  In waterbeds.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The Earth spins so fast that someone standing at the Equator is traveling at about 1,000 miles an hour.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some things you can do to help those affected by Hurricane Sandy?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you don’t pick up the ball and run with it… someone else will.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one eye say to the other eye?  “Just between you and me, something smells.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Bald eagles can swim.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Reading about __________ is fun because ____________.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You are today where your thoughts have brought you.  You will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you.”  -James Allen

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s the monster’s favorite cafeteria food?  Grave-y

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The largest bat colony in the world is in Bracken Cave, Texas.  During the summer, this cave is home to as many as 20 million Mexican free-tailed bats.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the best thing that happened to you this month?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When you make a mistake, there are only three things you should ever do about it:  1) admit it; 2) learn from it; and 3) don’t repeat it.”  -Paul “Bear” Bryant

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do goblins and ghosts drink on Halloween:  Ghoul-ade

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: One-third of all U.S. adults put on costumes and participate in Halloween activities.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you like being in the dark?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Be aware that the only ceiling life has is the one you give it.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s a vampire’s favorite sandwich?  Boo-loney

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More than 93% of children go trick-or-treating each year.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the scariest story you’ve ever heard or movie you’ve ever seen?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.”  -Will Rogers

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is the vampire unpopular?  Because he is a pain in the neck!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Today in North America, around $3 billion is spent every year on Halloween costumes alone.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could study one subject in school that wasn’t offered, what would it be and why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I never learned anything while I was talking.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s a ghost’s favorite food?  I scream and boo-berry pie.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Halloween is the second highest grossing commercial holiday after Christmas.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe the most difficult thing about being your age.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “He has the right to criticize, who has the heart to help.”  -Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do ghosts shop?  In boo-tiques.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A single brown bat can catch around 1,200 mosquito-size insects in one hour.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think a woman will be President of the United States in the near future?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Goals are dreams with deadlines.”  -Diana Scharf Hunt

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: You have an extra $100,000 to give away, and you cannot spend it on yourself.  What would you do with the money?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “By having adversity in life we can see in others and in ourselves who quits and those who won’t quit; and in the end, adversity will make winners of those who won’t quit.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the fisherman say to the magician?  “Pick a cod, any cod.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A Pennsylvania bakery made a hotdog that was 54 feet long.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you like to be invisible?  What would you do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What you believe yourself to be, you are.”  -Claude M. Bristol

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What happens when you annoy a clock?  It gets ticked off!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A human bone is five times stronger than a piece of steel of the same weight.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What would you do if you were trapped in an elevator?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Attitudes are contagious.  Is yours worth catching?”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is a soda machine’s favorite dance?  The can-can!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Sharks have no bones.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your worst fear?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows.”  -Helen Keller

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one plate say to the other?  “Dinner’s on me.”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The first email was sent in 1971.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Why should weekends be longer?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.”  -Robert Brault

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s the best thing to drink during a marathon?  Running water.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The world’s largest swimming pool, in Chile, stretches for half a mile.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Are you a person that likes change or do you like things to be predictable and stay the way they are?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Learn from the mistakes of others – you can never live long enough to make them all yourself.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: When is a tuba good for your teeth?  When it’s a tuba toothpaste.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There is no sound in space.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: How would you describe your class?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When you are through learning, you are through.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Would Little Miss Muffet share her curds?   No whey.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Popsicles were invented by an 11-year-old.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your first memory.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s not whether you get knocked down.  It’s whether you get up again.”  -Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a fish’s date?  His gill-friend.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: An alligator grows about 3,000 teeth in a lifetime.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Obstacles don’t have to stop you.  If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up.  Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.”  -Michael Jordan

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did the robber get caught at the art gallery?  He was framed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are more text messages sent each day than there are people on earth.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could be the spokesperson for any product on the market, what product would you choose to enthusiastically represent?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The bad news is time flies.  The good news is you’re the pilot.”  -Michael Altshuler

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why couldn’t the sailors play cards?  Because they were standing on the deck!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The brighter the star, the shorter its life span.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you eat breakfast?  Why is breakfast important?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you want to make good use of your time, you’ve got to know what’s most important and then give it all you’ve got.”  -Lee Iacocca

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: A cowboy went to a motel on Friday, stayed for two days, and left on Friday.  How was that possible?   His horse was named Friday.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Couples in Finland can get married in a chapel built out of snow.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Studies show that the more you help others, the better you will feel about yourself.  What are some ways in which you help others?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.”  -Zig Ziglar

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: When do doctors get angry?  When they run out of patients!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Dolphins sleep with one eye open.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Are you a good listener?  What makes a good listener?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s not the size of the man, but the size of his heart that matters.”  -Evander Holyfield

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the pie crust go to the dentist?  It needed a filling.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average person possesses between 500 and 700 different skills and abilities.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: In your opinion, what are your 10 best skills or abilities?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Remember that silence is sometimes the best answer.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Who won the skeleton beauty contest?  No body.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A man once ate 49 glazed doughnuts in 8 minutes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some of your best memories of Halloween?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.”  -William James

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did Count Dracula see his doctor?  He was always coffin.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Babies’ cries can sound different in different languages.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were asked to make a “Top Ten” list of the people you regard as the all-time greatest Americans, whom would you rank in the third, second, and first spots?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We live in a moment of history where change is so speeded up that we begin to see the present only when it is already disappearing.”  -R. D. Laing

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s it like to be kissed by a vampire?  It’s a pain in the neck.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Ferrets have been used to carry television cables through pipes in Europe.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were to write a book, what would you choose as the topic?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Do not fear the winds of adversity.  Remember, a kite rises against the wind rather than with it.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the skeleton cross the road?  Because he didn’t have the guts.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The London Bridge that kept falling down is now in Arizona, in the United States.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Everyone hears discussions that they consider boring.  What topic puts you to sleep more quickly than any other?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.”  -John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of mistakes do ghosts make?  Boo boos.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your skeleton has about 300 bones when you are born, but only 206 by the time you grow up.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could have one superpower, which would you choose?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Adversity makes some people break and makes others break records.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do ghosts serve for dessert?  Ice scream.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Pumpkins also come in red, green, yellow, blue, tan and white.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had to be trapped in a TV show for a month, which show would you choose?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Hard work spotlights the character of people:  some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don’t turn up at all.”  -Sam Ewig

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Who did Frankenstein take to the prom?  His ghoulfriend.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A tiger can eat more than 80 pounds of meat in one sitting.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the strangest thing you’ve ever eaten?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I’m trying to do the best I can.  I’m not concerned about tomorrow, but with what goes on today.”  -Mark Spitz

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: At what time did Dracula go to the dentist?  Tooth hurty.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your ears produce more wax when you’re afraid.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could have personally witnessed one event in history, what would you want to have seen?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Tackle your hardest job first.  Usually when we are faced with a number of projects to work on, we take the easiest or the most rewarding one first.  Start with a job you really don’t want to do.  Once you get it out of the way, everything else will seem easy.”  -Red Auerbach

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did the ghost fix the hole in his sheet?  With a pumpkin patch.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A cornflake shaped like the U.S. state of Illinois sold for $1,350.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Have you ever returned an item to a store for a refund after having used it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You have to have courage to make a decision and stick with it knowing people are going to criticize you no matter what you do.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of hair does the ocean have?  Wavy.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: French fries came from Belgium, not France.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Have you ever broken or lost something that belongs to someone else?  What did you do?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you really want something, you can figure out how to make it happen.”  -Cher

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What are a plumber’s favorite shoes?  Clogs.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your heartbeat is so powerful that it could shoot water six feet into the air.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some things you would like to change about yourself?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The trouble with opportunity is that it always comes disguised as hard work.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one wall say to the other?  Meet me at the corner.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Some spiders eat their own webs.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: We all make mistakes.  What is one of the biggest mistakes you’ve made?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you would rather have talked.”  -Mark Twain

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you get an astronaut’s baby to fall asleep?  Rocket.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Caterpillars have mouths, but butterflies don’t.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your least favorite subject in school?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The great challenge of life is to decide what’s important and to disregard everything else.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does a mouse feel after it takes a bath?  Squeaky clean.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There is a museum devoted to ramen noodles in Japan.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are your first school memories?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.”  -Martin Luther King

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the baseball player get arrested?  Because stealing is illegal.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Will having too many piercings (body, ear, nose etc) or tatoos hurt your chance of getting a job when you are older?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your attitude tells the world what you expect from life and whether you will achieve it or not.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the strawberry need a lawyer?  It was in a jam.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The lowest temperature of any place in the world was recorded in Antarctica.  127 degrees below fahrenheit.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: You can learn alot from older people.  Who is an older person that you really enjoy visiting with?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?”  -Vincent Van Gogh

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is it so hard to fool a snake?  Because you can’t pull its leg.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Before toothpaste was invented, some people cleaned their teeth with charcoal.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Are you a morning person or a night owl?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “In the end, the only people who fail are those who do not try.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the rabbit so unhappy?  She was having a bad hare day.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you like to be famous?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “There is a real magic in enthusiasm.  It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment.”  -Norman Vincent Peale

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the judge say when the skunk came in to testify?  Odor in the court!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Something this school really needs is…

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Acting without thinking is like shooting without aiming.”  -B.C. Forbes

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the teacher cross-eyed?  Because he couldn’t control his pupils!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “People don’t care about how much you know until they know how much you care.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Most spiders have 8 eyes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the best class you’ve ever had?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Most people fail not because they aim too high – but because they aim at nothing.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the teacher send the duck out of the classroom?  He was making wisequacks.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You can destroy your now by worrying about tomorrow.”  -Janis Joplin

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the dog do after he swallowed a firefly?  He barked with de-light!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: You can buy worms from a vending machine in Japan.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had a chance to live underwater for 1 month, would you do it?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “No one can predict to what heights you can soar.  Even you will not know until you spread your wings.”  -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a grizzly bear with no teeth?  A gummy bear.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.value: If you had to give up one technological advantage that you use all the time, what would it be?  Do you think you’d be better off without it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I swing big, with everything I’ve got.  I hit big or I miss big.  I like to live as big as I can.”  -Babe Ruth

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What made the newspaper blush?  It saw the comic strip.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Do you think homework is necessary?  Why or why not?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.”  -William Arthur Ward

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of cheese can you never have?  Nacho cheese.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are fifteen things you want to do in your lifetime?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Talent will get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.”  -John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
