fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You cannot discover new oceans unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.”   – Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What happens when you don’t dust your mirror?   You get a dirty look.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Over our lifetime we’ll spend approximately 28 years sleeping, 25 years working, 14 years watching TV, 8 years eating, 7.5 years in leisure or miscellaneous activities and 3.5 years getting dressed.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What type of service to others or good deed done for other people do you personally find the most rewarding?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The applause soon dies away, the prize is left behind, but the character you build up is yours forever.”   -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a nervous cow?   Beef jerky

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: We remember only 20% of what we hear.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What “moment of glory” have you watched another person celebrate that you too would love to experience if you could?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Courage is grace under pressure.”   – Winston Churchill

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s a frogs favorite drink?   Croak-a-Cola

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 100 million meteoroids enter the Earth’s atmosphere every day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Everyone hears discussions that they consider boring.  What topic puts you to sleep more quickly than any other?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Remember that silence is sometimes the best answer.”  – Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why are leprechauns so hard to get along with?   Because they’re very  short-tempered.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Blueberry juice boosts memory.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that you wake up and discover that everything you touch turns  green.  Write about what happens next.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way  things turn out.”   – John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What time is it when you have to go to the dentist?   Tooth – hurty!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had to create your own motto to live by, what would it be?   Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “”The true test of character is not how much we know how to do, but  how we behave when we don’t know what to do.”  – John Holt

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a gorilla with a banana in each ear?   Whatever you  want, he can’t hear you.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Confidence is contagious, as is lack of confidence.”   – Vince  Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the big firecracker say to the little firecracker?    My pop  is bigger than yours.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The name Wendy was made up for the book Peter Pan.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Write a paragraph that starts “It was a very windy day…”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “When bad times come, you can let them make you bitter or use them to  make you better.”   – Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the snail say when she climbed on the turtle’s back?    Wheeeeeeee!

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the pony cough?    He was a little hoarse!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: The first U.S. paper money was issued on this day in 1862.  If we did  not use money as currency, what could be used in its place.  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The greatest mistake a man can make is to be afraid of making one.”  -Elbert Hubbard

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What flower grows on your face?   Tulips!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The earth experiences 50,000 earthquakes each year.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: After waiting all winter, what is your favorite thing to do once spring arrives?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Talent will get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.”  -John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do snowmen keep their money?   In snow banks.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine you are lost in a foreign country and do not speak the language there.  How would you communicate with others without speaking?

fields.name: Thought of the Day

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: March is National Nutrition Month.  Write a letter to your favorite fast-food restaurant making suggestions on how its menu could be healthier.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Be humble – a lot was accomplished before you were born.”   – Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the digital clock say to the mother clock?   “Look mom, no hands!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are no fish in the dead sea.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine you just failed a test that you needed a good grade on in order to pass the class.  Would you tell your parents about the grade right away, or would you wait until report cards were sent home?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “In life, as in football, you won’t go far unless you know where the goalposts are.”   – Arnold Glasgow

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a girl with a frog on her head?    Lily!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Today is National Anthem Day.  Describe how you feel when you hear our national anthem being played.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Heart separates the good from the great.”   – Michael Jordan

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did Benjamin Franklin feel when he discovered electricity?    Shocked!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The daily production of gases in your large intestine measures 2 to 2.5 gallons.  You will emit about 0.2 gallons of this while your intestinal wall absorbs the rest.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “To the world you might be one person, but to one person you might be the world.”   – Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why can’t you tell a pig a secret?    Because it will squeal on you!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A Llama can spit 16.5 feet.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Write a poem that describes how you feel about winter.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you can react the same way to winning and losing, that… quality is important because it stays with you the rest of your life.”   -Chris Evert

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one eye say to the other?    Something between us smells!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: In every episode of Seinfeld, you can see something with Superman on it.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Pretend that you can travel back in time and change one thing in your life.  What would you change and why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.”   – Robert Brault

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why don’t crows ever get hit by cars?    Because one is always in the tree yelling “CAW CAW!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It is physically impossible to lick your own elbow.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Explain what you would do if you discovered that one of your classmates cheated on a test.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Growl all day and you’ll be dog tired by night.”   -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you cook a crocodile in?    A croc-pot!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Alexander Graham Bell, who invented the telephone, could never talk to his mother or his wife on it.  They were both deaf.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If one of your friends wanted to do something dangerous, what would you say to them?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Class is an intangible quality which commands, rather than demands, the respect of others.”   -John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: According to mathematical experts, a deck of cards must be shuffled at least seven times to avoid having them end up as they were from the start of the shuffle.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you rather have six months of winter or six months of summer?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “No matter what the level of ability, you have more potential than you can ever develop in a lifetime.”   -James T. McCay

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the tornado say to the car?    “You want to go for a spin?”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The estimated total cost of the Vancouver Olympics 2010 is currently set at $1.76 billion.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: National Pancake Week is celebrated in February.  Create a recipe for a pancake sandwich that uses two pancakes in place of bread.  What will you call your sandwich creation?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Your attitude tells the world what you expect from life and whether you will achieve it or not.”   -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you get when you cross a pair of pants with a dictionary?   Smarty-pants!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 50% of all bank robberies are done on Fridays.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that you are the captain of your own ship.  Where would you sail to?  Who would travel with you?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Challenges can be stepping stones or stumbling blocks.  It’s just a matter of how you view them.”   -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is a snakes favorite subject?    Hissss-tory!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The King of Hearts is the only king without a mustache.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: On this date in 1930 the planet Pluto was discovered by astronomer Clyde Tombaugh.  Pretend that you are an astronomer who just discovered another planet in our solar system.  Name your planet and describe what it looks like and where it is located.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.”  -Martin Luther King

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the hamburgers name their daughter?    Patty

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: No country in the southern hemisphere has every hosted a Winter Olympic Games.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your Top Ten list of books you have read?  What is a book that you have not yet read but would like to?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “We should never let our fears hold us back from pursuing our hopes.”   -John F. Kennedy

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What driver doesn’t need a license?   A screwdriver!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Norway has won the most number of medals at the Winter Olympics.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Would you rather do something on the spur of the moment or have it planned?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.”           -Helen Keller

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the couch afraid of the chair?   The chair was armed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Everyone is color-blind at birth.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were elected President, what is one of the first things you would like to accomplish?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Life is like a ten-speed bike – most of us have gears we never use.”  -Charles Schulz

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of flowers do you never give on Valentine’s Day?   Cauliflowers!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The Olympic Rings are five interlocking rings that stand for the five original continents (Africa, America, Asia, Australia, and Europe) and the athletes from around the world.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could compete in any Olympic sport, what would you choose and why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “To achieve all that is possible, we must attempt the impossible.”   -Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the stamp say to the envelope on Valentine’s Day?  I’m stuck on you!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The body gives off enough heat in thirty minutes to bring half a gallon of water to a boil.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Write a top ten list of reasons to love the library.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It is said that good things come to those who wait.  I believe that good things come to those who work.”     -Wilt Chamberlain

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the boy sheep say to the girl sheep on Valentine’s Day?   I Love Ewe!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A small child could crawl through a blue whale’s major arteries.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that you receive a phone call from your favorite celebrity.  Who is calling you, and what do you talk about?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Never ruin an apology with an excuse.”   Kimberly Johnson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the mama ladybug ground her kids?   They were bugging her.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The United States puts more of its citizens in prison than any other nation.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: February is National Children’s Dental Health Month.  Write the words to a short song that encourages children to brush their teeth every day.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Never discourage anyone who makes progress, no matter how slow.”   Plato

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of waves are impossible to swim in?    Microwaves.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A snail can sleep for three years.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that you have no electricity or running water.  Write about a day in your life without these luxuries.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You cannot be healthy; You cannot be happy; You cannot be prosperous; If you have a bad disposition.”   Emmet Fox

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the rope say after it tangled?   Oh no, knot again!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes about twenty seconds for a red blood cell to circle the whole body.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: February 5 is Weatherperson’s Day.  Pretend that you are a weatherperson reporting on a weather-related breaking news story.  Write what you would be broadcasting.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “One of the marks of successful people is that they are action-oriented.  One of the marks of average people is that they are talk-oriented.”  Brian Tracy

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Did you hear about the ice that lost its job?   It was crushed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: One single tree can be home to 20 million lice.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe how you think you will look 20 years from today.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us daily.”    Sally Koch

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the golfer bring two pairs of socks to the tournament?  In case she got a hole in one.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: If NASA decided to send birds up in space, the birds would soon die.  They need gravity to swallow.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that NASA has decided to take one student into space on its next mission.  Write a letter explaining why you should be chosen.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.”   Jim Valvano

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: When do doctors get angry?  When they run out of patients!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: During a lifetime, you will produce enough saliva to fill two swimming pools.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Pretend that your teacher has asked you to compile a list of tips to help your next substitute teacher.  What five tips would you include on the list?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “I’m wrong often, very often, and say it all the time.”   Steve Spurrier

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What gets wetter and wetter the more it dries?    A towel.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Research shows mosquitoes like people who have recently eaten bananas.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: When sharing a project with the class, would you rather present first or last?  Explain.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Worry is a futile thing; it’s somewhat like a rocking chair.  Although it keeps you occupied, it doesn’t get you anywhere.”   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the elephant leave the circus?   He was tired of working for peanuts.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average child recognizes more than two hundred company logos by the time he enters elementary school.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe what you think a kitchen is like in a submarine.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You will become like the five people you associate with the most.  This can be either a blessing or a curse.”    Billy Cox

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was everyone worried about the small bucket?    It was a little pail.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Thirty-five billion emails are sent each day throughout the world.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are some things you like about your school?  What is something you wish could be changed about your school?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Life is a series of problems.  Do we want to moan about them or solve them?”  M. Scott Peck

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the police investigate the seafood restaurant?   They knew something fishy was going on.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Seventy-five percent of Americans are chronically dehydrated.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your idea of a fun weekend?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “If you can dream it, you can do it.  Never lose sight of the fact that this whole thing was started by a mouse.”    Walt Disney

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the drummer bring a chicken to band practice?   He needed new drumsticks.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Your eyes remain the same size from the day you are born to the day you die.  Your nose and ears, however, never stop growing.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: You’re the principal for the day.  Describe your day.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It is surprising how much you can accomplish if you don’t care who gets the credit.”   Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one ocean say to the other?   Nothing, they just waved.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Dental enamel is the strongest material your body produces.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your typical lunch hour.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.”   Ralph Waldo Emerson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Are baseball umpires good eaters?   Yes – they always clean their plates.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It is physically impossible for a pig to look up at the sky.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your craziest experience in a restaurant or shopping mall?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You play the hand you’re dealt.  I think the game is worthwhile.”   Christopher Reeve

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did the robber get caught at the art gallery?   He was framed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: This year you will blow your nose 250 times.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the best school field trip you’ve been on?  Describe.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Young people need models, not critics.”   John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the teacher send the duck out of the classroom?   He was making wisequacks.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: On average, there are 333 pieces of toilet paper on one toilet roll.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe what a new student needs to know about your school.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.”   Lewis Cass

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why didn’t the turkey finish his dinner?  He was already stuffed.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Women blink twice as often as men do.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite food and how do you make it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “For every pass I caught in a game, I caught a thousand in practice.”   Don Hutson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the sticker need a lawyer?   It was ripped off.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A cow burps every 40 seconds.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Describe your most unforgettable dream.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.”   Mother Teresa

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a bird that’s been eaten by a cat?   A swallow.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Two million mites live in your bed.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Instead of fighting wars, what do you think would be a good, perhaps creative, way for countries to settle their differences with each other?  (Bowling anyone?)

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The world is full of willing people, some willing to work, the others willing to let them.”   Robert Frost

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the judge say when the skunk came in to testify?   Odor in the court!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: If you use earphones for one hour, you will increase the amount of bacteria in your ears by 700%.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Imagine that you have just won a special award.  Write an acceptance speech that includes what the award is for.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “You can spend your life any way you want to, but you can only spend it once.”  Dwight Thompson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the tomato dad say to his tomato son who was always lagging behind?   Ketchup!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The greatest amount of bacteria on your body is hidden between your toes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: Which person in American history do you think had the greatest impact on our country?  Why?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “Success is always temporary.  When all is said and done, the only thing you’ll have left is your character.”   Vince Gill

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the trombone player get kicked out of the band?   Because he kept letting things slide.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Every chocolate bar produced contains an average of 8 insect legs.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could design the kid-perfect house, what particular features would the house (and yard) have?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “It’s not hard to make decisions when you know what your values are.”   Roy Disney

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do ghosts make great cheerleaders?   They have lots of spirit.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Right-handed people live approximately 9 years longer than left-handed people.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were in charge of planning something really special that could cheer up a group of sick kids at a nearby hospital, what would you plan?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: When you’re in it up to your ears, you should keep your mouth shut.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Teacher:  Why is the Mississippi such an unusual river?   Pupil:  Because it has four eyes and can’t see!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Elephants can smell water from as far away as three miles.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you met a 100-year-old person and could ask that individual one question about his or her life, what would you be most curious to find out?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.   E.E. Cummings

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why are movie stars so cool?  Because they have many fans!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The stall closest to the door in a bathroom is the cleanest, because it is the least used.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What are three specific things that you think make our country such a great nation to live in?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: You have not lived until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What happens when a frog parks illegally?  It gets toad!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are 293 ways to make change for a dollar.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your favorite thing that begins with the letter “W”?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The best things in life aren’t things.  Art Buchwald

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Doctor, Doctor I feel like a sheep.    That’s baaaaaaaaaaaaaad!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Months that begin on a Sunday will always have a ‘Friday the 13th.’

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is your New Years resolution?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Shoot for the moon.  Even if you miss, you will land amongst the stars.  Jill McLemore

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one casket say to the other?  Was that you coffin?

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Dragonflies have six legs but cannot walk!

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What big ideas or dreams do you have right now that you would like to see come true someday?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.   Mark Twain

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the policeman say to his belly?  You’re under a vest!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A goldfish has a  memory span of three seconds.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the coolest thing you’ve ever made by hand?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Snowflakes are one of nature’s most fragile things, but just look what they can do when they stick together.   Vista M. Kelly

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the traffic light say to the car?    Don’t look, I’m changing!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: What is the only food that doesn’t spoil?    Honey

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is something you own that would surprise friends?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: People who jump to conclusions generally leap over the facts.    Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why don’t abominable snowmen every marry?    They always get cold feet.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The name for Oz in the “Wizard of Oz” was thought up when the creator, Frank Baum, looked at his filing cabinet and saw A-N, and O-Z, hence “Oz.”

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is something make believe that you wish was real?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The most important ingredient in your gym bag is your attitude.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the math book sad?    It had too many problems.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: On an average day in the United States, about forty people are hurt on trampolines.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the most fun you’ve ever had doing something outside in the rain?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Nobody said life would be easy… and you only make it tougher if you feel sorry for yourself.   Morley Fraser

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the car smelly?   It had too much gas.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Sound carries so well in the Arctic that, on a calm day, a conversation can be heard from 1.8 miles away.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had to come up with a new Holiday tradition for your family, what would you suggest as the new tradition?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: There is no right way to do the wrong thing.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why couldn’t Noah catch many fish while he was on the Ark?   Because he only had two worms!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Airbags inflate at a rate of 200 miles per hour.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were keeping a list of all the fun things you’ve done so far in your life, which three things would you put at the very top of the list?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: If a man never fails, it may be because he never tries.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does a mouse feel after it takes a bath?    Squeaky clean!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average American dog will cost its owner $20,000 in its lifetime.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could create a new candy bar, what would you name it and what would be inside of it?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: A winner listens; a loser just waits until it is his turn to talk.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What has lots of eyes but can’t see?   A potato!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A snowflake can take up to an hour to fall from the cloud to the surface of the earth.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were a teacher, what is one book you would insist that your whole class read?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Attitudes are contagious.  Is yours worth catching?   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why couldn’t the monkey catch the banana?    The banana split.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The number one cause of blindness in the United States is diabetes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could get a one-hour lesson from any professional athlete, whom would you want to give you the lesson?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Character is much easier kept than recovered.  Thomas Paine

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s a cat’s favorite color?   Purrrrrrple.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes food seven seconds to get from the mouth to the stomach.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: In your opinion, which person whom you know has the funniest-sounding sneeze?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Eighty percent of success is showing up.   Woody Allen

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do basketball players stay home during the off-season?    They aren’t allowed to travel!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Robins eat three miles of earthworms in a year.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What sound can you imitate the best?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The tougher the job, the greater the reward.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What game do astronauts play?  Moon-opoly!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Strawberries have more vitamin C than oranges.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could put any message you wanted on a billboard along a busy highway, what would the billboard say?  (You can’t use more than 10 words, so make each one count!)

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Before you flare up at anyone’s faults, take time to count ten, ten of your own.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a snowman in the summer?   A puddle!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Happy Birthday To You is the most often sung song in America.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What do you think is the most important thing that friends can do for each other?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Winners never quit and quitters never win.  Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s a ghost’s favorite meat?   Boo-lony!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It’s impossible to sneeze with your eyes open.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What event or activity in the next two months are you looking forward to more than anything else?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Your life can’t go according to plan if you have no plan.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Knock knock.  Who’s there?  Arch!  Arch who?  You catching a cold?

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Chewing gum while peeling onions will keep you from crying.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the best gift you’ve ever received?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Adversity makes some people break and makes others break records.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the clown go to the doctor?   He was feeling a little funny.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average person falls asleep in seven minutes.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had to choose between exploring outer space or the bottom of the deepest ocean, which one would you choose?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: You never get a second chance to make a good first impression.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do cows go on a Saturday night?   To the moo-vies!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A toothpick is the object most often choked on by Americans.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could enter a food-eating contest, which food would you be the most delighted to devour?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: A man may make mistakes, but he isn’t a failure until he starts blaming someone else.   John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a Sleeping Bull?   A Bull-Dozer!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: If you sleep in a cold room, you are more likely to have a bad dream.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is something you’ve done only one time so far in your life that you can’t wait to do a second time?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: You prove your worth with your actions, not with your mouth.  Pat Riley

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the cop say to the popsicle?  Freeze!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Blue is the favorite color of 80% of Americans.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is one subject currently not being taught in your school that you would love to see added to your learning experience?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Whenever you fall, pick up something.      Oswald Theodore Avery

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the baseball coach throw Cinderella off the team?  Because she ran away from the ball.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Elvis Presley got a ‘C’ in his eighth grade music class.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: In your opinion, what is the nicest thing you’ve ever done for your parents?  How about for a friend?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.  Jimi Hendrix

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What would you get if you crossed a great hockey player with a  Sea-Doo?  Wayne Jet-ski!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: By age 70, an average person will have lost 105 pounds of skin.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What would your dream house look like?  Be as descriptive as possible.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Wisdom outweighs strength.  African Proverb

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a gorilla with a green thumb?  Hairy Potter!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Fingernails grow faster than toenails.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: As the Christmas season approaches, what song is it that you just can’t wait to hear?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.  Ralph Waldo Emerson

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of cheese can you never have?  Nacho Cheese!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes 17 muscles to smile and 43 to frown.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you had to write your own personal definition of the word “success,” what would it be?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra!

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of nail does a carpenter hate to hit?  His thumbnail!!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A sneeze can exceed the speed of 100 mph.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is one piece of advice that you wish you could pass along to everyone else?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: We are what we repeatedly do.  Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.  Aristotle

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of music do they play at a soft-drink factory?  Pop!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A human being loses an average of 40 to 100 strands of hair a day.

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What was your favorite thing to pretend when you were a young child?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: I do the best I know how, the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing it to the end.  Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the soda machine’s favorite dance?  The can-can!

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: How is it possible to have a “civil” war?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could have the voice of any famous person, living or deceased, whose voice would you want to claim as your own?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Your rewards in life are always in direct proportion to your contributions.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What has a head and a tail but no body?  A coin!

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: Why do we sing “Take me out to the ball game” when we’re already there?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is one talent you have that few people know about, or something you can do quite well that might surprise others?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: To youth I have but three words of counsel – work, work, work.   Otto Von Bismarck

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you get four suits for a dollar?  Buy a deck of cards!

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: If man evolved from monkeys and apes, why do we still have monkeys and apes?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What world record would you most want to establish if you could?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The best angle from which to approach any problem is the try-angle.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the light bulb say to the switch?  You turn me on.

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: Why doesn’t Tarzan have a beard?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: You’ve no doubt heard the expression, “They couldn’t pay me enough to do that job.”  What job would that be for you?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: In all things do your best……The man who has done his best has done everything.  The man who has done less than his best has done nothing.    Charles M. Schwab

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the bald man say when he got a comb for his birthday?  “I’ll never part with it!”

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: What little birdies see when they get knocked unconscious?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If snow could fall in any flavor, what flavor would you choose?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Add try and umph…..see what you come up with.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value:
“Nick,” said the teacher, “make a sentence with the words ‘defeat, defense, deduct and detail.'”
Nick thought for a few minutes and smiled.  He said, “Defeat of deduct went over defense before detail!”

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: Why does sour cream have an expiration date?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is the best piece of advice you have ever received in your life?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Success is peace of mind in knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.  John Wooden

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the library so tall?  It had a lot of stories!

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: Why do you get on a bus or a train but get into a car?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you could enter a racehorse in the Kentucky Derby, what would you name your horse?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Nothing good comes in life or athletics unless a lot of hard work has preceded the effort.  Only temporary success is achieved by taking short cuts.  Roger Staubach

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the teacher cross-eyed?  Because he couldn’t control his pupils!

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: Is a hot car cool or is a cool car hot?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: When was the last time you laughed so hard that you cried?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Winning isn’t everything, but making the effort to win is.   Vince Lombardi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the janitor quit his job?  He wanted to make a clean sweep!

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: How come abbreviated is such a long word?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: What is one item you own that you really should throw away… but probably never will?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Success is important, but defeats are valuable.  C.M. Jones

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do magicians do so well in school?  They’re good at trick questions.

fields.name: Did you ever wonder…
fields.value: Why doesn’t glue stick to the inside of the bottle?

fields.name: Journal Entry Idea
fields.value: If you were making a list of five things (not people!) that make you happiest in your life, what five things would you write down?

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: We learn wisdom from failure much more than from success.  We often discover what will do by finding out what will not do, and probably one who never made a mistake never made a discovery.  Samuel Smiles

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: A baker stopped making donuts after he got tired of the hole thing!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More than 150,000,000,000 pieces of mail are delivered each year in the U.S.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Blessed are those who can give without remembering and take without forgetting.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why is Swiss cheese served in church?  Because it’s holey!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Elephants can’t jump.  Every other mammal can.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Leadership is based on inspiration, not domination; on cooperation, not intimidation.  William Arthur Ward

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What runs but never walks?  Water!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: “I am.” and “I do.” are the shortest complete sentences in the English language.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Trust your hunches.  They’re usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.  Dr. Joyce Brothers

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where do Eskimos train their dogs?  In the mush room!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: A cow gives nearly 200,000 glasses of milk in her lifetime!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did the limestone say to the geologist?  Don’t take me for granite!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Vatican City has its own money and stamps.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: An idea is only as good as its execution.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What kind of mistakes do ghosts make?  Boo Boo’s!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Ants stretch when they wake up.  They also appear to yawn in a very human manner before taking up the tasks of the day.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do.  The hard part is doing it.  General H. Norman Schwarzkopf

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do witches keep their hair in place while flying?  Scare Spray!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More than 50% of the people in the world have never made or received a telephone call.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: There are no short cuts to any place worth going.

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do ghosts add to their morning cereal?  Booberries!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The chance of you dying on the way to get your lottery ticket is greater than your chance of actually winning.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.   Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why does a vampire need mouthwash?  Because he has bat breath!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: After eating too much food, your hearing becomes less sharp.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Ideals are like stars; you will not succeed in touching them with your hands, but like the seafaring man on the desert of waters, you choose them as your guides, and following them, you ready your destiny.   Carl Schurz

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is a vampire’s favorite sport?  Casketball!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: 40,000 Americans are injured by toilets each year!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Let your mistakes be a comma, not a period.     Unknown

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: If athletes get athlete’s foot, what do astronauts get?  Mistletoe!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The strongest muscle in the body is the tongue.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: When you are laboring for others, let it be with the same zeal as if it were for yourself.   Confucius

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What has a bottom at the top?  Your legs!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: When Coca-Cola began to be sold in China, the used the characters that would sound like “Coca-Cola” when spoken.  Unfortunately, what they turned out to mean was “Bite the wax tadpole.”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Reading is to the mind what exercising is to the body.  Sir Richard Steele

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s is like to be kissed by a vampire?  It’s a pain in the neck!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Punctuation was not invented until the 1500’s.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Adversity does not build character.  It reveals it.

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you mend a broken jack-o-lantern?  With a pumpkin patch!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The average human eats 8 spiders in their lifetime at night.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: A ship is safer in harbor, but that’s not what ships are for.    William Shedd

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do ghosts say when something is really neat?   Ghoul!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The United States was the first and only to incorporate daylight savings time.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Ability is what you’re capable of doing.  Motivation determines what you do.  Attitude determines how well you do it.    Lou Holtz

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where does the Easter Bunny go for breakfast?  IHOP!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The Beatles played the Las Vegas Convention Center in 1964.  Some 8,500 fans paid just $4 each for tickets.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: As long as you’re going to be thinking anyway, THINK BIG!  Donald Trump

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you get if you cross a chicken with a cement mixer?  A brick layer!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The loop on a belt that holds the loose end is called a “keeper.”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: The measure of a man’s real character is what he would do if he knew he would never be found out.    T. B. Macaulay

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the Ram fall over the cliff?  He didn’t see the ewe turn!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are more insects in one square mile of rural land than there are humans on the entire earth.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Happiness is like a butterfly: the more you chase it, the more it will elude you, but if you turn your attention to other things, it will come and sit softly on you shoulder.    Henry David Thoreau

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why don’t tennis players get married?  Love means nothing to them!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes more than 500 peanuts to make one 12 oz. jar of peanut butter.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Time cannot be purchases, saved or borrowed.  It can only be spent.  The secret, then, is to spend it wisely.

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What did one potato chip say to the other potato chip?  Want to go for a dip?

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The citrus soda 7-Up was created in 1929.  “7” was selected because the original containers were 7 ounces.  “Up” indicated the direction of the bubbles.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow.  Learn as if you were to live forever.  Gandhi

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the oreo cookie go to the doctor?  He felt a little crumby.

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Lynyrd Skynyrd was the name of the gym teacher of the boys who went on to form that band.  He once told them, “You boys ain’t never gonna amount to nothin’.”

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: When you were born, you cried and the world rejoiced.  Live your life so that when you die, the world cries and you rejoice.   Cherokee Expression

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why should you not play cards in the jungle?  Because there are a lot of cheetahs!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The 57 on a Heinz ketchup bottle represents the number of varieties of pickle the company once had.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day and you are a success.  William J.H. Boetcker

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How did the Vikings send secret messages?  By norse code!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: There are 53 Lego bricks manufactured for each person in the world.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: It is not fair to ask of others what you are unwilling to do yourself.   Anna Eleanor Roosevelt

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: I wondered why the baseball was getting bigger.  Then it hit me!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Fast food hamburgers cost more pound for pound than a new car.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Mistakes are a fact of life.  It is the response to error that counts.  Nikki Giovanni

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How does the brain communicate with the nerves?   With a cell phone!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Sneezes can travel at 100 mph!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: There are two great days in a person’s life – the day the were born and the day we discover why.  William Barclay

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why was the belt arrested?  Because it held up a pair of pants!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Tigers not only have striped fur but striped skin as well!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned in life:  It goes on!   Robert Frost

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What is the difference between a teacher and a train?  A teacher says “spit out that gum” and a train says “choo, choo, choo!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: If the sun were to burn out, we would not know for 8 minutes!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Be a good listener.  Your ears will never get you in trouble.   Frank Tyger

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the golfer wear two pairs of pants?    Just in case he got a hole-in-one!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Dreamt is the only English word that ends in the letters “mt”.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: I am a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn’t have the heart to let him down.     Abraham Lincoln

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why did the boy eat his homework?   Because the teacher said is was a piece of cake!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The microwave was invented after a researcher walked by a radar tube and a chocolate bar melted in his pocket.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, as long as ever you can.  John Wesley

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you make a Kleenex dance?  Put a little boogie in it!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More food is thrown out each day in the United States than is needed to feed its hungry…..by McDonald’s.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Human kindness has never weakened the stamina or softened the fiber of a free people.  A nation does not have to be cruel to be tough.  Franklin D. Roosevelt

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: The butcher backed up into the meat grinder and got a little behind in his work!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: When nobody else is around, 47% of people drink straight from the carton.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Remember there’s no such thing as a small act of kindness.  Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.  Scott Adams

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What’s an eight letter word that only has one letter in it?  An envelope!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: You may be on the right track, but if you just sit there you’ll get run over.   Paul H. Dunn

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Where was the Declaration of Independence signed?   At the bottom!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Manhattan Island of New York City was purchased for $24 from the Algonquian Indians in 1624.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, as long as ever you can.  John Wesley

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you make a Kleenex dance?  Put a little boogie in it!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: More food is thrown out each day in the United States than is needed to feed its hungry…..by McDonald’s.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Only soup cans need labels – not people!

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: What do you call a cow that doesn’t give milk?    A milk dud!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: The heart pumps about 1 million barrels of blood during an average lifetime!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Minds are like parachutes, they function only when open.     Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: How do you spell mousetrap in just three letter?  C-A-T!

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: Approximately one-third of the population can’t snap their fingers!

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: Only those who do nothing at all make no mistakes……but that would be a mistake.  Anonymous

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: Why do male deer need braces?  Because they have “buck teeth!”

fields.name: Random Fact of the Day
fields.value: It takes about 63,000 trees to make the newsprint for the average Sunday edition of the New York Times.

fields.name: Thought of the Day
fields.value: “The world is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing.”     Albert Einstein

fields.name: Joke of the Day
fields.value: If #2 pencils are so popular, why are they still #2?

fields.name: Random Thought of the Day
fields.value: A blue whale’s heart is the size of a Volkswagon Beetle!
